attributes.action: Free travel to and from work for Key Workers who are required to go to work.
attributes.additional_details: Key Workers are the backbone of the health and social care services (Ambulance Service, Allied Health Professionals, Social workers and others). We should be granted free travel to and from work on public transport.
attributes.background: We would like all Key Workers that are required to travel to work by public transport to have  free travel during the COVID-19 crisis.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305801

You may also wish to sign this petition:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305854

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
